random.mobinfo1: The browser does not support all mobile chat function.
random.mobinfo2: We recommend to install the application
random.searchStatus1: We are looking for a suitable interlocutor...
random.helpText1:
With the help of icons, you can indicate your preference on the subject of communication. 
If you, for example, forbid 'camera', 
to you will not have to connect with those who are seeking to communicate with the camera.
random.helpText2:
Search settings you can not ask - then you will be offered a random interlocutor 
which also did not ask specific criteria.
random.helpText3:
If you want to filter by gender, it should be specified, and your gender. 
If you select the age of the interlocutor - You can specify multiple groups.
publish.preview.info1: Check out the dialogue before publication.
publish.preview.info2: Hide the personal data when they occur in the dialogue.
publish.preview.info3: personal data include the phone number, name, photograph, address, profile in social networks and so on.
publish.preview.info4: Hide text and images via the menu that appears when you click on the message.
publish.preview.title: Title (optional)
publish.message.removeAbove: Delete messages <span class = " text-bold "> above </ span>
publish.message.removeBelow: Delete messages <span class = " text-bold "> below </ span>
publish.success.link: The reference to the published chat
publish.success.note: In general, the list will be published after being moderated.
pubs.title: Interesting
pubs.description: Links to interesting topics that can be discussed
pubs.notice.emptyUrl: First you need to insert a reference
pubs.notice.publish: Link will soon appear in the list
about.description: Chat without registration, where you can just hang out and meet new people through quick dialogue
share.description: This message means that you can share with your friends a link to our chat.
share.title8: Like the chat? Friends like it too!
share.title9: I like a chat? Tell your friends!;)
bubble.vegetable.me.title: Vegetability
bubble.vegetable.me.text: You demonstrate vegetable behavior. It is not friendly.
bubble.vegetable.partner.title: Vegetability
bubble.vegetable.partner.text: The chat mate demonstrates vegetable behavior. Don't do like this.
bubble.level2.title: Not bad for a start
bubble.level2.text: You have already scored more than 10 points. Let's see what will happen next.
bubble.level3.title: Wow, more than 25 points!
bubble.level3.text: I must admit, not weak head
bubble.level4.title: Over a 100
bubble.level4.text: This movement to the heavens - to the Moon, definitely
bubble.level5.title: Over 250!
message.finished: The chat mate left the chat room.
message.finished.thanks: The chat mate left the chat room, thanking. Thank you!:
message.finished.boring: The chat mate left the chat. Reason: Boring
message.finished.disgusting: The chat mate left the chat. Reason: Unpleasant conversation
complaints.ignorance: A gross violation of the specified conversation criteria
circle.menu.header1: You can specify the reason for tripping, thus help the other party understand that it should be corrected in the communication.
circle.menu.header2: To disconnect without cause - click on the cross.
circle.menu.disable: Do not show this menu (always just disconnect)
